name: Gaurank Maheshwari
title: AI Developer | Researcher | Data Scientist

current_role.title: AI Developer
current_role.summary: Leading development of aiPaperboyz – an AI-powered podcast-summarization and transcript-delivery platform. Built a scalable FastAPI/PostgreSQL backend, a Deepgram + GPT-4 enrichment pipeline, an email-delivery scheduler with AWS SES, and a secure React/TypeScript frontend with Firebase Auth and Tailwind CSS. Deployed CI/CD via Docker and GitHub Actions.

research.focus: Multimodal information processing and human-AI interaction
research.impact: Contributed to a robot–human collaboration project using genetic algorithms, improving task-completion efficiency by 20%.
labs: Center for Accessibility and Inclusion Research

work_experience.title: Junior Data Scientist
work_experience.summary: Built data-driven models to enhance NFT scarcity using behavioral metrics, increasing perceived token value by 10% and boosting launch interest among more than 200 users.

work_experience.title: Graduate Teaching Assistant
work_experience.summary: Teaching Assistant for DSCI-640 (Neural Networks) and DSCI-601 (Applied Data Science); helped students debug models, apply ML algorithms, and structure deep-learning pipelines.

projects.name: aiPaperboyz
projects.description: An AI-powered podcast-summarization platform with speaker diarization and transcript enrichment using LLM agents. Features scheduled email delivery, a personalized feed, and a secure frontend UI. Built with React, FastAPI, PostgreSQL, AWS SES, Deepgram, and GPT-4.

projects.name: NewsLens AI
projects.description: Capstone project that reduced hallucinations in AI-generated news summaries by more than 90% using Gemini, GPT-3.5, and Hugging Face NER; also established a bias-detection metric pipeline.

projects.name: LangChain Q&A Agent
projects.description: Developed a LangChain-based knowledge-extraction tool with FAISS and GPT, improving retrieval accuracy by 30% over 100+ queries. Delivered in a Streamlit UI.

strengths: Clear communicator with a deep understanding of LLM and agentic pipelines
Translates research insights into scalable product systems
Thrives in iterative, founder-style build cycles
Balances full-stack responsibilities with model optimization
weaknesses: Tends to over-polish and over-document by default
May over-engineer if early constraints are not clearly defined

fun_facts: Loves to travel and explore uncharted places — from spontaneous road trips to structured adventure itineraries — and is especially fond of motorbike journeys.
Has gone bungee-jumping in Rishikesh and is always chasing the next adrenaline rush.
Former state-level cricket player in Rajasthan; applies lessons of discipline, strategy, and teamwork from the pitch to the codebase.
Cooks great food — especially fusion and Indian-spiced meals — and pairs it with carefully curated playlists that match mood, tempo, and flow.
Enjoys motivational films such as ‘The Social Network’, ‘3 Idiots’, and ‘The Pursuit of Happyness’, but balances them with plenty of comedy because laughter builds resilience.
Known to quote lines like: ‘Great men are not born great… they grow great.’ (The Godfather) or ‘We accept the love we think we deserve.’ (The Perks of Being a Wallflower).
